about_the_game:
Fear comes from accidental situations.

Let Camilla get out of her sudden changed terror and back to her family's side.
Sometimes run wild, sometimes use ideas to be with her family
she wants to go back to her happy daily life.

Camilla is a Pac-Man-type running simulation game,

Check the number of goods needed to clear the stage between maze-like cities,

and buildings, and get the goods as you run.

[Stage Clear Tips]
- Check the number of target goods required to clear each stage
- Avoid monsters that interfere with the acquisition of goods, acquire the target goods, and move on to the next stage
- Items you can spot in between help you avoid monsters.

Clear the stage with a total of three stages to reach the final ending.

[How to play]
moving: WASD
Jump: Shift
Interaction: E
Backflip: F
[Play time]
30 minutes to an hour

Configuration options provide screen adjustment, sound-related adjustment options.
This game supports Korean, English, and Japanese.

name: Camilla (カミラ)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10, 11
  • Processor: inter Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Pac-Man-type running simulation Camilla is the story of a girl who confronts fear. Check the number of acquired goods for clearance for each stage and acquire all the goods and move on to the next stage. You can clear all the stages consisting of three stages and check the final ending.
